sense.def:
To sneak somewhere
pomeni nekam tiho priti ali oditi in se truditi, da nas ne bi nihče videl ali slišal.

cit.quote: prikrasti se, pritihotapiti se; odkrasti se, odtihotapiti se

seg.quote: I didn't notice Bob sneaking up behind me.

sense.def:
To sneak something somewhere
pomeni nekaj skrivaj nekam nesti.

seg.quote: Eugene would sneak food down to his room.

sense.def:
To sneak a look at someone or something
pomeni na hitro in skrivaj pogledati nekoga ali nekaj.

Priložnost, ki je
sneak
, je neuradna; takrat si lahko nekaj ogledamo, preden je uradno na ogled javnosti.

seg.quote: We were shown his latest masterpiece in a sneak preview.
